metadata.title: CVE-2016-4536 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The client in OpenAFS before 1.6.17 does not properly initialize the (1)AFSStoreStatus, (2) AFSStoreVolumeStatus, (3) VldbListByAttributes, and (4)ListAddrByAttributes structures, which might allow remote attackers toobtain sensitive memory information by leveraging access to RPC calltraffic.

criterions.comment: openafs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
